title: 10 - The Art of Living in Wonder with Bob Goff
description:
There’s no one like Bob Goff. You will leave this conversation with a huge grin on your face, more wonder in your soul, and eyes open for what God’s doing all around you. Want to fight the cynicism in you? Listen to this episode.

Find Bob here: https://bobgoff.com

You will love his book ‘Love Does’: https://lovedoesstore.org/collections/love-does/products/love-does-softcover-unsigned

A seriously fun camp for your whole family: https://pine.co.ve/Jennie_5

Find Get Out of Your Head book: getoutofyourheadbook.com
itunes:author: Jennie Allen
